  • Method Details

    • setScheduled

      public AbstractAppointmentState setScheduled(AccountType accountType) throws InvalidStateException, InvalidAccessException
      Description copied from class: AbstractAppointmentState
      Change the state of the appointment to 'Scheduled'. The current state can be only 'Requested'. Only the Receptionist has the right to change the state to 'Scheduled'.
      Overrides:
      setScheduled in class AbstractAppointmentState
      Parameters:
      accountType - the type of user which is allowed to modify the current state of the appointment
      Returns:
      the class representing the new state of the appointment
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - if the state of the appointment cannot be changed to the given new state from the current state
      InvalidAccessException - if the user doesn't have the right to set the appointment's new state
